general.greeting_msg: What would you like to do today?
general.table_global_filter_tooltip: Search with any keyword in the table rows (e.g., VIN#, asset type, location,...)
general.expired_notify: This request will no longer be accepted or updated with a quote.
general.not_expired_notify: Please provide a quote no later than {{expire_date}}

requestProgress.waiting_for_vendor_content: Waiting for vendor to provide quotes.
requestProgress.awaiting_approval_content: Your request is being considered for approval.
requestProgress.awaiting_transfer_content: Your transfer request is now awaiting for transfer.
requestProgress.approved_content: Cheer up! Your request has been approved.
requestProgress.built_content: Your asset is built successfully. Please wait the vendor to ship the asset.
requestProgress.in_transit_content: Please wait while your request being completed!
requestProgress.at_vendor_content: Your asset is now in service at vendor.
requestProgress.complete_content: Good news, Your request is now complete.
requestProgress.delivered_content: Congratulations! Your asset has been delivered.
requestProgress.in_progress_content: Your request is now in progress.
requestProgress.order_in_transit_content: Your order is on the way.
requestProgress.in_transit_to_vendor_content_true: Client's asset is now awaiting for pickup.
requestProgress.in_transit_to_vendor_content_false: Client is on the way dropping off the asset.
requestProgress.in_transit_to_client_content_true: Asset delivery from vendor is on the way.
requestProgress.in_transit_to_client_content_false: Client is on the way picking up the asset.

loginForm.promo_text: World's only fully integrated monitoring system to help measure performance of assets throughout its lifecycle
loginForm.info_not_provided: Please enter your username and password.
loginForm.forgot_password_email_sent_text: A verification link has been sent to your email account.
loginForm.request_password_body: Do you want to request a new password? Click the button and we'll send a new password to your email account.
loginForm.request_password_sent_text: A new password has been sent to your email account.

accountOptions.password_update_success: You've successfully change your account password. Please login with your new password.

feedbackPanel.label_undesired_desk: Undesired - A particular feature can be improved
feedbackPanel.label_feedback_desk: Feedback - Let us know how we can make the experience better for you :)

repairsPanelIndex.tabList_select_each_vin: Select each VIN to see repair details
repairsPanelIndex.issue-critical-tooltip:
Critical: Asset is not operative or is unsafe. 
 Non-critical: Asset is not a safety issue.

repairIssueDetails.dialog_text: Update status to complete; Repair completed date will be set to today. Is that correct? (or pick another date)
